titleStmt.title: The Kings Maiesties resolution concerning the Lord Major of London, now prisoner in the Tower, being committed thither by the command of both Houses of Parliament with His Majesties desires to all his loving subjects both in his kingdom of England, and dominion of Wales ... likewise exceeding joyfull news from Manchester and Hull...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Ordered that this be printed and published. John Brown Cler. Parl."
Imperfect: print show-through with loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
